Method Detail

createBusManager

public static ISysBusManager createBusManager(ISysConfigItem configItem)
                                       throws CSysBusException,
                                              CSysConfigException
Create a new instance of an ISysBusManager.

Parameters:
configItem - The item of the configuration that contains the data for creating the bus manager. It must contain the item named ISysGlobal.KEY_CLASS_NAME.
Returns:
an ISysBus
Throws:
CSysBusException - if creation of ISysBus fails for any reason
CSysConfigException - if the configuration is wrong

createBus

public static ISysBus createBus(ISysConfigItem configItem)
                         throws CSysBusException,
                                CSysConfigException
Create a new instance of an ISysBus.

Parameters:
configItem - The item of the configuration that contains the data for creating the bus. It must contain the item named ISysGlobal.KEY_CLASS_NAME.
Returns:
an ISysBus
Throws:
CSysBusException - if creation of ISysBus fails for any reason
CSysConfigException - if the configuration is wrong
